amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that none of the funds in the bill be available to Planned Parenthood for any purpose under title X of the Public Health Services Act (Population Research and Voluntary Family Planning Programs).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-222 to provide that none of the funds in the bill be available to Planned Parenthood for any purpose under title X of the Public Health Services Act (Population Research and Voluntary Family Planning Programs).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pence amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 247 (Roll no. 643).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Pence.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pence amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 247 (Roll no. 643).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
